title: Emmerdale spoilers: Sally Dexter opens up about Faith's sad exit
text:
Faith Dingle is certainly a force to be reckoned with in Emmerdale, and the character has been at the centre of a lot of big storylines, but her time on the soap is coming to an end — at least for now — and actress Sally Dexter has spoken further about her upcoming exit.

Since arriving in the village back in 2017, Faith has featured in a number of Emmerdale’s big storylines, and it certainly didn’t take her long to become a fan-favourite. However, she’s not long for the village, as actress Sally will soon be departing the soap — something which she first confirmed to Metro.co.uk at the Inside Soap Awards earlier this month.

Sally’s elaborated further on the reasons behind her upcoming departure. Speaking to Inside Soap, she said: ‘At the beginning of the year, I was thinking about my job at Emmerdale and how much I love it and how I’d hate for it to become anything less than the job I adore.’

‘So I’m leaving now, but maybe one day I’ll come back to it. Never say never. After all, Cain needs his mum. Whenever people see me out and about in the street, they tell me that I need to keep him in order.’

Speaking of Cain (Jeff Hordley), Faith will plays a huge role in upcoming episodes, as she enlightens her son about how she believes Moira (Natalie J Robb) is having an affair behind his back — a revelation which will lead to some pretty explosive events.

Speaking to Metro.co.uk at the Inside Soap awards about the events to come, Sally said: ‘It’s going to be an explosive October. I may have to leave for a little while.’
